assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Sowmiya Moorthie, Hannah Blencowe, Matthew Darlison, Joy Lawn, Joan K Morris, Bernadette Modell, and the Congenital Disorders Expert Group declare they have no conflict of interest.This article does not contain any studies with human or animal subjects performed by any of the authors.
